column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $1$1$5$"was sent to a mental emergency hospital for evaluation....I was forced by 5 people to lay down while they gave me a shot of this..along w xanax and benadryl and zofram
column3: to ""CALM DOWN"" I tell u what....it did not calm me down at all
column5: I was purely enraged! It was as if they gave me water in a needle! This stuff is a joke!
